title: STAT+: FDA announces sweeping changes to oversight of wearables, AI-enabled devices
description: The FDA will ease regulation of digital health products, aiming to deregulate AI and promote its widespread use.
content: The FDA will ease regulation of digital health products, aiming to deregulate AI and promote its widespread use.
